scripts.dev:apps: concurrently -n KPI,INFRA -c magenta,green "pnpm -C kpi dev" "pnpm -C infraestructura dev"
scripts.copy:kpi: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force public\kpi -ErrorAction Ignore; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force public\kpi > $null; robocopy kpi\dist public\kpi /E > $null"
scripts.build:infra: pnpm -C infraestructura install && pnpm -C infraestructura build
scripts.copy:infra: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force public\infraestructura -ErrorAction Ignore; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force public\infraestructura > $null; robocopy infraestructura\dist public\infraestructura /E > $null"
scripts.build:external: pnpm build:infra && pnpm copy:infra && pnpm build:kpi && pnpm copy:kpi
